metadata.title: CVE-2018-5431 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The domain designer component of TIBCO Software Inc.'s TIBCO JasperReportsServer, TIBCO JasperReports Server Community Edition, TIBCO JasperReportsServer for ActiveMatrix BPM, TIBCO Jaspersoft for AWS with Multi-Tenancy,and TIBCO Jaspersoft Reporting and Analytics for AWS contains avulnerability which may allow, in the context of a non-default permissionsconfiguration, persisted cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks. Affectedreleases include TIBCO Software Inc.'s TIBCO JasperReports Server: versionsup to and including 6.2.4; 6.3.0; 6.3.2; 6.3.3; 6.4.0; 6.4.2, TIBCOJasperReports Server Community Edition: versions up to and including 6.4.2,TIBCO JasperReports Server for ActiveMatrix BPM: versions up to andincluding 6.4.2, TIBCO Jaspersoft for AWS with Multi-Tenancy: versions upto and including 6.4.2, TIBCO Jaspersoft Reporting and Analytics for AWS:versions up to and including 6.4.2.

criterions.comment: jasperreports: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
